scripts.compile: yarn --cwd='../' contracts-v01 compile && yarn --cwd='../' contracts-v02 compile
scripts.build: yarn --cwd='../' contracts-v01 build && yarn --cwd='../' contracts-v02 build
scripts.clean: yarn --cwd='../' contracts-v01 clean && yarn --cwd='../' contracts-v02 clean
scripts.test: yarn --cwd='../' contracts-v01 test && yarn --cwd='../' contracts-v02 test
scripts.lint: yarn --cwd='../' contracts-v01 lint && yarn --cwd='../' contracts-v02 lint
scripts.test-non-vrf: yarn --cwd='../' contracts-v01 test-non-vrf && yarn --cwd='../' contracts-v02 test
